DOC.brief_summary: Additional educational training lecture provide healthcare worker . Outcome measure cultural competency complete assess patient safety , risk management , cultural competency healthcare provider urban academic Labor Delivery Unit .
DOC.brief_title: Cultural Competency , Risk Management , Patient Safety Internet-Based Curriculum OB/GYN Resident Physicians
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : Patient safety , risk management , cultural competency essential topic healthcare provider mastery high stake , urban academic Labor Delivery Unit . Methods : A prospective cross sectional pilot study perform IRB exempt status examine effect internet base educational curriculum topic include patient safety , risk management cultural competency 6 month amongst OB/GYN Family Medicine medical student , nurse , physician . 76 healthcare provider participate . Assessments take place curriculum implementation . Primary outcome measure cultural competency measure Tucker-Culturally Sensitive Health Care Inventory ( TCSHCI ) Provider Form , Pascal Metrics Patient Safety survey healthcare provider , patient satisfaction measure Press Ganey patient survey score , poor Labor Delivery Outcomes . The curriculum intervention include five online lecture last 30-60 minute pertain cultural competency , risk management , patient safety , Team STEPPS training .
DOC.criteria: . Inclusion criterion OB/GYN medical student , Labor Delivery nurse , resident/ attend physician OB/GYN , Pediatrics , Anesthesia , Family Medicine . .Exclusion criterion provider refuse participation , complete course June 2013 .
